content:
Under Constuction :) Resume Internships PlayStation – Software Engineer Intern My experience will be published on the Sony blog!
Snoonu – Software Engineer Intern Snoonu is projected to be Qatar's first unicorn after raising $5 million in its Series A round. I worked with .NET and Apache Superset. Teaching & Research Undergraduate Research Assistant Supervised by Dan Garcia CS 61A Head TA (Undergraduate Student Instructor) Summer 2022, Fall 2022 CS 61A TA (Undergraduate Student Instructor) CS 61A Tutor Advocacy ASUC Office of Academic Affairs – Director of Academic Planning I was appointed in the students' association to focus on the long-term future of UC Berkeley's academics. United Nations – Youth Representative Report: E/CN.15/2019/15 Organizations Debate Society of Berkeley, Parliamentary Debate at Berkeley, BridgeUSA, Delta Gamma Sorority

content:
CS 61A Head uGSI Summer 2022 charlottele [at] berkeley [dot] edu
Labs M, W | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Discussions Tu, Th | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Office Hours W | 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM | Online
F | 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM | Cory 521 Links Attendance Form: go.cs61a.org/char-attend Anonymous Feedback Form: go.cs61a.org/char-anon 1-on-1 Advising Appointments: go.cs61a.org/char-advice Join Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-help View Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-queue Logistics All participation points should be visible and up to date now! Please fill out this form if you’re missing any points. Attendance Discussion The secret word will be given at the end of section. You must attend the entire section. Your attendance status will be verified with the Zoom meeting data. Lab The secret word will be given towards the beginning of section. You can use this time to work on the lab assignment and ask any questions. If you complete the lab assignment before section, you can submit your okpy link as the secret word for credit. Contact Please use Piazza or office hours for debugging and general logistical questions. I’m happy to respond to emails, but there are almost 100 students enrolled in my section so it’s a bit difficult. Emails should generally be reserved for personal or section-specific matters. Dozens of staff monitor Piazza all day, so you’ll recieve a much faster response there. Weekly Material Week 1 Disc 00: Getting Started pdf Disc 01: Variables and Functions + Control pdf Week 2 Disc 02: Environment Diagrams + Higher-Order Functions pdf Disc 03: Recursion + Tree Recursion pdf Week 3 Disc 04: Lists + Sequences pdf Lab 03: Recursion png Disc 05: Mutability + OOP pdf Week 5 Disc 07: Scheme png Guides Debugging pdf Environment Diagramspdf
